text.__SUMMARY__: Geranium aculeolatum is a herbaceous plant species in the Geraniaceae family. It is native from Africa, where it is found in tropical regions. It is found in forested areas in clearings and often has climbing or trailing stems that root at the nodes.
text.External links: Dressler, S.; Schmidt, M. & Zizka, G. (2014). "Geranium aculeolatum". African plants – a Photo Guide. Frankfurt/Main: Forschungsinstitut Senckenberg.
